description: Marks a body part as having sensory capabilities like vision, hearing, smell, or tactile sensitivity. Sensory parts can detect environmental stimuli and threats.

vision.description: Whether this part provides vision capability

hearing.description: Whether this part provides hearing capability

smell.description: Whether this part provides smell/olfactory capability

taste.description: Whether this part provides taste capability

touch.description: Whether this part provides tactile sensitivity

echolocation.description: Whether this part provides echolocation capability for navigation and object detection
